short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables a hotkey (defaults to Ctrl+Shift+2 on Windows, ⌘⇧2 on Mac) for toggling the microphone in Twitch's Stream Together.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stream Together is a Twitch product that helps streamers collaborate on-stream with other streamers across multiple live channels, or as guests on a single channel. Stream Together also makes it easy for streamers to bring members of their community live on stream.

This extension enables a global hotkey to toggle the microphone status for the Stream Together backstage page, allowing you to quickly mute or unmute yourself within the call.
